revised_title: Acknowledgments of Royal Society Lectures and Exhibits
tldr: This article acknowledges the contributions of various individuals and institutions in supporting lectures and exhibits at the Royal Society. It expresses gratitude to the lecturers, the Royal Institution staff, and those who provided permission for the reproduction of illustrations. The article also mentions the loan of historical items, such as an assay furnace used by Newton, and the loan of manuscript letters and verses from Lord Keynes.
scientific_discipline: Biographies and Book Reviews > History of Science
